name: Q.be
description:
Beta version 0.8 is available for testing, go check it out!
Now it,s only Windows version, Linux coming soon.

  • Q.be is a small but atmospheric, pixelart game about cube tries to escape a maze of mechanical obstacles. It is sort of puzzle-platformer one, but it got it's specific mood. Hope you like that one, and it's a bit specific art style. 
  • Have fun playing!
  • That's also my first (finished, because actually it's my second game, but first one was just a mistake) game in unity, so be aware of bugs and if you find some, report them!
